overview_of_class: The central idea of this course is that there is such a thing as human nature, and it comes from our shared evolutionary history. Broad topics include mating psychology, and how men and women differ in their approaches to lust and love; and culture, and how humans are unusual among living things in their ability to acquire knowledge. Carries science or social science credit. PSYCH 110 or equivalent.
name: Evolutionary Psychology
title: SCS PSYCH 342-CN-65 Evolutionary Psychology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
